name: Wiget Poster S
author: Zwooll

sections.description: A plugin that works as an example of how you can easily write your own widget. Feel free to use it as a blueprint for your own plugin. In the latest version, you can post your banner as a widget.
sections.installation:
Here are a few main steps that you need to make the plugin working:

  1. Download this plugin;
  2. Put the wiget_poster_s.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory;
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress;
sections.faq:
Why did you make this plugin?

I just want to share my experience in widget making.

It doesn’t work for the latest WordPress version, what do?

This plugin currently supports WP version up to 3.0.1, but I’m planning to release refactoring and fixes for the latest version.
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Global cleanup of the comments.
  • Added banner example.

0.3

  • Fix few bugs.

0.2

  • Added more fields for the widget menu.

0.1

  • First stable version.
